name: Implement Array.prototype.filter()
description: What we want to implement is `Array.prototype.filter()` function, just like the existing `Array.prototype.filter()`. Another similar function is `_.filter()` in underscore.js and lodash.js. The usage will be quite simple, like: ``` [1, 2, 3, 4, 5].filter(num => num > 3) == [4, 5] ``` *Of course, the existing `Array.prototype.filter()` function has been undefined for the purposes of this Kata.* --- More info can be found here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/filter
